TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskDependencies extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Specifies any dependencies of a task. Any task that is explicitly specified or within a dependency range must complete before the dependant task will be scheduled.

MemberSignature.Value: public TaskDependencies (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> taskIds, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.Azure.Batch.TaskIdRange> taskIdRanges);

new Microsoft.Azure.Batch.TaskDependencies : seq<string> * seq<Microsoft.Azure.Batch.TaskIdRange> -> Microsoft.Azure.Batch.TaskDependencies

Docs.param: The list of task ids that must complete before this task can be scheduled. null is treated as an empty list.
The list of task ranges that must complete before this task can be scheduled. null is treated as an empty list.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.remarks: This constructor provides the most general way of initializing a TaskDependencies object. In practice, most dependencies are on a single task, a list of task ids, or a single range of tasks. You can express these dependencies more clearly using , , , and methods.

Docs.summary: Gets the list of task IDs that this task depends on. All tasks in this list must complete successfully before the dependent task can be scheduled.

Docs.summary: Gets the list of task ID ranges that this task depends on. All tasks in all ranges must complete successfully before the dependent task can be scheduled.
